title: Remarkable photographs are accused of being photoshopped - but they're all genuine
text:
These pictures appear too unbelievable to not be edited - but they are all unaltered.

In a gallery collated by Bored Panda, people from across the world shared the near-perfect moments they captured on camera.

The impressive images include a snap which has the four different parts of a landscape perfectly divided by a fence, and a spray of water that looks like an elephant as the animal stands underneath it.

Here, FEMAIL showcases a selection of the best shots...

What a picture! A spray of water that appears in the shape of an elephant is captured as the very same animal stands underneath it at a location in Thailand

This rainbow, captured above the moon as the sun sets in an unidentified area, is said to be unaltered

This spot on the Interstate 80 in Wyoming is known as the Highway to Heaven by locals as the road appears to drift off into the sky

How handy! This eagle seems to have human features as it stands in front of a window with a person's body reflected on to it as the unidentified man takes his image

Four different parts of a picturesque landscape are perfectly divided by a fence in this image. It is unclear where the picture was taken

Clean break: One person, from an unknown area, was amazed to find their cup smash like this, creating an optical illusion affect

These burnout marks look 3D, with many social media users suggesting the image seems like a scene out of Back To The Future. It is unclear where the image was taken

Living it large: An anonymous mother captures her son as he climbs up an old tree stump, but is impressed to find her picture look like a giant scaling some mountains

The pole's positioning in this photograph taken in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia makes it appear as if you're looking at two completely different scenes

Matching! This paint choice left people mesmerised when it meant a building in Colorado Springs started to blend into the sky after being decorated
description: Bored Panda has shared photos taken by people from across the world that capture amazing optical illusions, including a spray of water that looked like the elephant standing beneath.
